name.baseName: coal mining; underground fully mechanized coal mining
煤炭回采;井下综合机械化开采煤炭

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This paper uses the life cycle idea to determine the carbon emission boundary of the fully mechanized process under different geological conditions.The purpose of this study was to calculate the amount of CO2 released by each source of carbon emissions throughout the underground coal mining process.
本文运用生命周期思想，确定了不同地质条件下综采过程的碳排放边界。本研究的目的是计算煤炭地下开采过程中各碳排放源释放的CO2量。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The Fifth-II mining area of the Jinda Coal Mine is located in Tengzhou City, Shandong Province, China . The average east–west width of the Fifth-II mining area is about 0.66 km, the average north–south length is about 2.9 km, and the total area is about 1.94 km^2.
金达煤矿五—二开采区位于中国山东省滕州市。五—二开采区的东西宽度平均为0.66km,南北长度平均为2.9km,总体区域面积为1.94平方千米。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The fully mechanized mining process consists of four specific processes: falling and mining coal, transporting coal, roof support, and treatment of the coal mine gob area.
综采工艺由落煤采煤、运煤、顶板支护、煤矿采空区处理四个具体工艺组成。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The coal extracted from the Fifth-II mining area of the Jinda Coal Mine located in Tengzhou City, Shandong Province, China, is intended for energy production and various industrial applications. The fully mechanized underground mining process ensures efficient retrieval of coal suitable for use in power plants, manufacturing processes, and as a feedstock for chemicals production. The region-specific characteristics, such as the dimensions and mining technology employed, influence the quality and applicability of the coal extracted.
金达煤矿五—二区位于中国山东省滕州市开采的煤炭主要用于能源生产和各种工业应用。井下综合机械化开采工艺确保了高效提取适用于电厂、制造过程以及作为化工原料的煤炭。区域特定的特点，如开采区域的尺寸和使用的采矿技术，影响了所提取煤炭的质量和适用性。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Collect the relevant data on carbon emissions in the mining process of the Jinda Coal Mine, and the B-R model is used to obtain the carbon emissions in the mining process of this mining area.
收集金达煤矿开采过程中碳排放的相关数据，利用B - R模型得到该矿区开采过程中的碳排放量。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Li, B. et al. Research on a Carbon Emission Calculation Model and Method for an Underground Fully Mechanized Mining Process. Energies 15, 2871 (2022).
Li, B. et al. Research on a Carbon Emission Calculation Model and Method for an Underground Fully Mechanized Mining Process. Energies 15, 2871 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing the LCA data from the Jinda Coal Mine's Fifth-II mining area, it is important to consider the specific conditions of the mining process, such as technological level, geological conditions, and employed mining techniques. Ensure accurate representation of carbon emissions by using the B-R model, which has been specifically adapted to the mining processes of this area. Note that the data set does not include input flows and focuses on output flows of coal and CO2. The data should not be used for comparing with mines that employ different mining methods or technological setups without proper normalization.
在使用金达煤矿五—二区的生命周期评估数据时，需要考虑采矿过程的具体条件，例如技术水平、地质条件和采用的采矿技术。使用B-R模型确保碳排放数据的准确表达，该模型已针对该矿区的采矿过程进行了特别适配。请注意，数据集不包括输入流，重点关注煤炭和CO2的输出流。在没有适当规范化的情况下，数据不应用于与采用不同开采方法或技术设置的矿山进行比较。

completeness.common:other: The output flow is complete, mainly coal and CO2, and there is no input flow.
输出流完整，以煤炭和CO2为主，无输入流。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The literature does not explain the amount of coal input. Assume : the amount of coal input : output = 1 : 1.
文献中没有说明煤炭的投入量，假设：煤炭的投入量:产出量=1:1
The amount of coal mined in the whole fully mechanized mining ( 4 process flows ) process in the 5-2 coal mining area.
5-2采煤区域整个综采（4个工艺流程）过程开采的煤炭量。

5-2 coal mining area of the whole fully mechanized mining ( 4 process flow ) process of CO2 emissions ; the original text does not distinguish the flow of bio and fossil, and it is judged by experts to be fossil.
5-2采煤区域整个综采（4个工艺流程）过程的CO2排放量;原文未区分bio和fossil的流，根据专家判断此处为fossil。
